biography.summary: Kevin Cramer is an American politician serving as the U.S. Senator from North Dakota since 2019. A Republican, he previously represented North Dakota in the U.S. House of Representatives from 2013 to 2019. Before entering Congress, Cramer built a career in business and broadcasting, and he focuses on energy, agriculture, and rural issues.

contact.office_address: 313 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510
